content: Cordless oscillating multitool SMT 6-22 Powerful cordless multitool with a StarlockMax interface, AVR and an oscillating angle of 4° ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier to change inserts - Starlock Max compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Wide range of inserts available – cover the most needed applications on a jobsite Brushless motor for more durability and better performance Bigger oscillating angle of up to 4° - cover a wider area of material in less time Decoupled head with AVR for increased user comfort Applications Plunge cuts and cut-outs in wood, drywall and plasterboard Metal and PVC pipe cutting Renovation work such as removing tiles, grout, nails, glue and paint Wood cutting and sanding (mainly trimming and small adjustments) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Drywall, Wood, Mortar, Paint, Wood with nails, Softwood (fir, pine etc.), Cement, Metal, PVC, Timber No load RPM: gear 1: 20000 rpm Triaxial vibration value for cutting board (ah,B): 2.5 m/s² Technical Data | Base material | Drywall, Wood, Mortar, Paint, Wood with nails, Softwood (fir, pine etc.), Cement, Metal, PVC, Timber | No load RPM | gear 1: 20000 rpm | Triaxial vibration value for cutting board (ah,B) | 2.5 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 79 dB (A) | 2 | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Guaranteed sound power level LWA (2000/14/EC at full load) | 87 dB (A) | Application | Sawing, Cutting, Sanding, Sanding Paint and varnish, Sanding Wood, Plastic pipes, Door frame removal, Cutting holes | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2366390 - Multitool SMT 6-22 bulk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SMT 6-22 Multi-Tool - 1x Starlock plus BiM E-cut blade Blade
